name: Rashida Begum
message: Thanks to the generous donors, my children and I stayed warm during this harsh winter. We could not have survived without this help.

name: Mohammad Karim
message: The warmth from the donated clothing gave me hope when I was at my lowest. I’m truly grateful to everyone who contributed.

name: Amina Begum
message: I’ve never experienced such kindness. The warm jackets and blankets we received were a lifesaver during the cold season.
